shared.model

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The game manager class acts as a facade between the player/game objects and the ServerProxy/UI
    Author:
    matthewcarlson, garrettegan
